participant_1.background:
I had to eat an entire plate of broccoli once.
i get distracted easily.
I am a white person who is raising my child in an environmentally friendly way.
I miss my family but I enjoy my job and my hobbies.
my brother is an archaeologist.

participant_2.background:
I once spent a week in a cabin in the mountains in the middle of winter and loved every minute of it.
I go for a walk with my dogs every day.
I'm a touring musician, but I also like gardening.
i have an above average iq.
I've had to give up some of my favorite foods to get healthy.

content.text: It's going well! I just got back from a week-long trip to the mountains.
That sounds amazing! What did you do?
I went skiing, hiking, and just hung out in a cabin. It was so peaceful and relaxing.
It sounds like you had a great time! I'm jealous.
It was definitely a good time. I'm glad I got to spend it with my family.
I bet! I miss my family sometimes. I'm a white person who is raising my child in an environmentally friendly way.
That's great! What are some things you do to raise your child in an environmentally friendly way?
I recycle as much as possible, we use reusable bags when we go grocery shopping, and we try to eat less meat.
That's awesome! I try to do those things too. I also have a garden where I grow some of my own food.
That's so cool! I wish I had a garden.
It's not too hard to start one. You can start with some potted plants and see how you like it.
I might have to give that a try!
You should! It's a lot of fun.
